Line.Text: Go away, you square-shaped doughnut!
Err…
Don’t you see? My badger is solving an equation. We cannot be disturbed.
Your… badger.
Have you seen my waffle? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds. Without my waffle, all is lost.
No, sorry.
What on earth are you talking about?
Oh, that’s all right. The universe was already destroyed while we were talking.
Oh, never mind. The universe was already destroyed while we were talking.
The entire universe?
Yep. But we can always get another one. Those 11 dimensions are not just for the show, you know.
Uh… let me just gather my thoughts, and I’ll be back in a second, okay?
Go away, you square-shaped doughnut!
Cloe, is it? My name is Michael; I investigate the incident that’s happened to your friend Ashley.
I think you’re mistaking me for someone else. I call on behalf of LIFE+. You should have received a message explaining the situation.
I’ll return a little later.
Don’t you see? My badger is solving an equation. We cannot be disturbed.
I need to ask you a few questions. It’s important.
Are you aware that you are a suspect in this case? Were you not warned that cooperation is strongly advised?
Have you seen my waffle? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds. Without my waffle, all is lost.
Are you even listening? We need to have a serious conversation.
Is this supposed to be a joke? Because now is not the time.
What’s the point? The universe was just destroyed.
I think the timing is perfect: the universe was just destroyed.
Please, miss, don’t make this more complicated than it has to be.
I can make it much harder for you, you know. In fact, I’d be happy to.
There is nothing complicated here – we just get another universe. Those 11 dimensions are not just for the show, you know.
There is nothing hard here – we just get another universe. Those 11 dimensions are not just for the show, you know.
Seriously, knock it off. Ignoring me will get you nowhere.
You have one last chance to cooperate with me, or else…
Anyhow, all is well that ends well. Gotta go, see you later.
Unbelievable…
Hey, wait a second, we’re not finished here!
(The call has been terminated.)
Go away, you square-shaped doughnut!
Right away.
Don’t you see? My badger is solving an equation. We cannot be disturbed.
Stop. Just stop, okay?
Is that how you always talk to strangers?
Cloe, please. I’ve seen you on the meet-up day's recordings. I know that you are capable of normal human conversation.
Have you seen my waffle? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds. Without my waffle, all is lost.
Why are you doing this? There’s got to be some point behind it all.
Even funny jokes lose their appeal when repeated over and over again, you know.
Actually, never mind. The universe has already been destroyed.
Are you even sane? Am I talking with an actual person here?
I knew you were gonna say that.
But hey, good news, we’ve got another one. Those 11 dimensions are really handy.
I mean, there is a slight variation in your responses, but ultimately, you keep saying the same nonsense.
You sound like a bot to me. Or a badly written NPC.
Anyhow, all is well that ends well. Gotta go, see you later.
Yeah, as if that would help…
Go away, you square-shaped doughnut!
I’m a round-shaped doughnut, thank you very much.
I can’t go away, I don’t have legs. I also can’t roll away, because I’m a square.
Yeah, I should really do that.
Well duh, they’re one and the same thing. But don’t you see? My badger is solving an equation. We cannot be disturbed.
Hmm, you’ve got a point. It’s just that, as you can see, my badger is solving an equation, and we don’t want to be disturbed, so…
I don’t think doughnuts are able to see.
What kind of badger?
Why make him do all the work?
A little distraction is helpful when approaching complex problems. Don’t worry, have a break; the solution might just pop into your head.
Of course they do, they have eyes. Speaking of, have you seen my waffle? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds, so it’s kinda important.
A multidimensional badger. But don’t bother with him; the important thing is that Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds, and my waffle is our only hope. Have you seen it, by the way?
To be honest, I’m terrible at math. But I’m pretty good with waffles. Have you seen one around, by the way? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds, so it’s kinda important.
That’s what he says as well, but you both forget that Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds, and our only hope is my waffle. Have you seen it, by the way?
Yep, I have your waffle right here.
I think your badger ate it.
Wow, you must be under a lot of time pressure.
Your mixture of astronomy and gastronomy is adorable.
Unlikely. He’s more of a taco person. But what does it matter? The universe has already been destroyed.
Time doesn’t really exist. The universe still ends though.
Thanks. I tried it to save the universe, but it got obliterated again.
Thank you!
I didn’t actually give you a waffle, you know.
Wow, you responded properly. Can you stop fooling around and answer my questions now?
How can I when the universe has already been destroyed?
It’s the thought that counts.
Not when Betelgeuse goes supernova, it doesn’t.
No, it really does. My waffle materialized in front of me just because you thought about it hard enough.
Couldn’t you materialize it yourself?
You know what, I could. Wow, that was quite a plot hole.
Finally caught you off guard, eh?
Hey, that’s not how we do things here. You were supposed to give an explanation why you couldn’t; something at least remotely believable.
Relax, it’s just a show. Besides, the universe has been destroyed anyway.
Who destroyed it, by the way?
Yeah, the end of the world is a pretty common thing these days.
I never realized one little supernova explosion could end an entire universe.
That would sound unfortunate if I didn’t know the ending already.
My badger. A couple of miscalculations, and… well, no big deal, we have another one. Those 11 dimensions are sure handy.
Tell me about it. I can barely leave my house without destroying everything there is. Good thing we can always utilize the power of 11 dimensions and get a spare.
Oh, it’s a terribly fragile thing. One sneeze could end an entire universe, for all I know. But not to worry, there’s always another one. Those 11 dimensions aren’t just for the show.
Yeah, kinda anticlimactic. But hey, that’s the power of 11 dimensions for you.
And how does that work, exactly?
I bet that’s the only thing you know about physics.
How come it’s still only 11?
People think science is funny… it’s not funny. It’s freaking hard.
I have no idea, I just know that it ends well and we can all breathe out with relief. Anyhow, gotta go, see you later.
I bet I don’t even know that. But hey, gotta go, see you later.
Well, that’s how many dimensions my badger has. He looks kinda weird… but I guess all is well that ends well. Gotta go, see you later.
Oh, don’t worry, it gets pretty manageable once you have a math-solving multidimensional badger. Anyhow, gotta go, see you later.
I’d rather not.
Sure, I’ll be back for more.
Go away, you square-shaped doughnut!
How can we have the same conversation any number of times?
Because conversations, like universes, are endless.
Yet all the same.
Yet all the same. Anyho, talk to you later.
Yep. Looking forward to it.
That is debatable.
Me? I personally never trusted penguins.
Don’t you see? My badger is solving an equation. We cannot be disturbed.
I mean, whenever a penguin appears in a story, I just can’t help but to be skeptical about their supposedly insignificant “comic relief” role.
Have you seen my waffle? Betelgeuse goes supernova in 4 nanoseconds. Without my waffle, all is lost.

What if Pen Pen was the one who killed Kaji? How about Skipper and co. who set Madagascar’s plot in motion by taking over the ship? And let’s not forget Orgalorg. These kinds of examples simply don’t add credibility to your species.
Oh, never mind. The universe was already destroyed while we were talking.
Think about it: you have an entire continent away from prying eyes to hatch your evil plans. The whole thing could be one big penguin conspiracy, for all I know.
Though we can always get another one. Those 11 dimensions are not just for the show, you know.
Anyway, talk to you later.
If you insist.
